title: Public exposure: A sorority hazing novella
description: Annabelle always thought sex was something shared between a man and a woman behind closed doors. But when she joins the sorority Zeta Gamma Rho, she soon finds out that there is so much more to try. Sheâ€™s taken hard, in public, filled up by strangers, while others watch or join in. She is humiliated and whipped. In this kinky novella, limits are pushed and boundaries are violated until Annabelle is left sore and satisfied.
author: Brooke Vestri
